subject: Reset Your {{project_title}} Account Password
body:
Dear {{first_name}}

We received a request to reset your password. To reset your password, please enter this OTP: {{verification_code}}.

Please note that the OTP will expire after 10 minutes.

If you did not request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.

For any assistance, please contact us at {{support_email}}

With regards,
The {{project_title}} Team
